title: How to Link to a User on Reddit on Android

steps.title: Open Reddit.
steps.content: Open Reddit. It’s the red icon with a white robot inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Navigate to the subreddit where you want to link to a user.
steps.content: Navigate to the subreddit where you want to link to a user. You can search for a subreddit by typing its name into the search box at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Open the post on which you want to comment.
steps.content: Open the post on which you want to comment.

steps.title: Tap the comment button.
steps.content: Tap the comment button. It’s the arrow at the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Add /u/[username] to your comment.
steps.content: Add /u/[username] to your comment. Type anything you wish to post, and add the username tag (replacing “[username]” with the Reddit user’s username) anywhere in the comment.

steps.title: Tap Post.
steps.content: Tap Post . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. Your comment will now appear in the thread with a link to a Redditor’s profile.
